member.name: IMFCameraOcclusionStateReport.GetOcclusionState
member.summary: Gets the camera occlusion state associated with the occlusion state report.
member.param: A DWORD output parameter containing a value from the enumeration.
member.returns: | Error code | Description | |------------|-------------| | S_OK | Succeeded | | E_INVALIDARG | occlusionState is nullptr. |

member.name: IMFCameraOcclusionStateReport
member.summary: Provides the camera occlusion state associated with a state change detected by an .
